# Data Description

This data is collected from accelerometer and gyroscope 3-axial signals. The
transducer is indicated in the tidy data as 'Acceleratometer' or 'Gyroscope'. Time
domain data is indicated as "timedomain" while frequency domain data is listed as
"frequencydomain" from Fast Fourier Transform output. From the original data set,
only mean and standard deviation ("std") data is kept. The axis of motion
is indicated by "-X", "-Y" and "-Z". Please see the table below for the original data
set name, new name, and whether the data was retained or not. All data is normalized
to unitless magnitude of -1 to 1.
